wikipedia_page.main: Andrew William Pozzi (born 15 May 1992) is a British hurdling athlete. He is, as of March 2021, the current indoor World Champion at 60 metres hurdles. He was the 2012 UK 60m and 110m Champion and holds the record for the fastest ever time run by a UK junior hurdler. The record time, 13.29 seconds, was set on 3 July 2011 in Mannheim, Germany at the Bauhaus Junior Gala.Pozzi is coached by Malcolm Arnold, the former coach of Olympic silver medalist and two-time World Championship gold medalist Colin Jackson and 400m Olympic gold medalist John Akii-Bua.On 26 November 2011, Pozzi won "Outstanding Athlete of the Year" at the UK Athletics Awards.

response: * Andrew Pozzi (1992–), 110m hurdler born in Stratford-upon-Avon.

response: Ali Kamé was disqualified for false starting. Andrew Pozzi failed to finish the race. Shamar Sands crashed over the sixth hurdle; he eventually finished but was officially disqualified for not jumping each hurdle. Doucouré was obstructed by Sands and advanced to the semifinals.
